FuncDef:
The trace mac enable command enables the GMAC trace function.
The undo trace mac enable command disables the GMAC trace function.
By default, the GMAC trace function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want to implement the following functions, run the trace mac enable command to enable GMAC trace.
Perform GMAC trace operations.Enable the destination device to reply to the source device after receiving a GMAC trace message.
